attributes.action: Keep driving test centres open during the second national lockdown
attributes.additional_details: There has been a massive backlog with tests this year and people are having to wait months for there driving tests its affecting peoples jobs, a lot of workers have to drive and require a test to work not being able to do this will affect there livelihood let's not also forget the driving instructors that now also are out for work for 4 weeks which also could be longer and affect their income.
attributes.background: Keep the driving test centres open and allow driving instructors to run lessons

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
